abstract: It’s a vote of confidence most companies can only dream of. Munich Re, the giant German reinsurance company, said Tuesday that Warren Buffett’s stake in the firm had surpassed 10 percent, and that the American billionaire in charge of Berkshire Hathaway would seek to acquire greater voting rights in the company.
snippet: It’s a vote of confidence most companies can only dream of. Munich Re, the giant German reinsurance company, said Tuesday that Warren Buffett’s stake in the firm had surpassed 10 percent, and that the American billionaire in charge of Berkshire Ha...
lead_paragraph: It is a vote of confidence most companies can only dream of. Munich Re, the German reinsurance company, said on Tuesday that Warren E. Buffett’s stake in the company had surpassed 10 percent.

headline.main: Buffett Increasing Stake in Munich Re
